name: King Slime
desc: This slime became big enough to have rudiments of intelligence.

name: Alkaline Slime
desc: A liquid form of life based on organic alkalis.

name: Slime
desc: A simple liquid form of life.

name: Seductive Slime
desc: A humanoid liquid form of life, finding food for itself by seducing unwary travelers.

name: Treasure Slime
desc: A liquid form of life, tending to build a basic endoskeleton from gems and precious metals.

name: Acid Slime
desc: A liquid form of life based on organic acids.

name: Samurai
desc: A fast and agile swordsman.

name: Warrior
desc: A common warrior, quite skilled in close combat.

name: Archer
desc: A common archer, quite skilled in ranged combat.

name: Soldier
desc: A trained, battle-seasoned soldier.

name: Barbarian
desc: A wild nomad, cruel and merciless.

name: Orc
desc: An ugly, fat, green monster. Barely has enough intelligence to use basic weapon and armor.

name: Amazon Thief
desc: Amazons Thieves steal newborn girls to raise more amazons.

name: Amazon Warrior
desc: Amazons Warriors protect amazon tribes from unwanted guests, also known as men.

name: Amazon Archer
desc: Amazons Archers provide fresh male animals as a food for amazon tribes.

name: Assassin
desc: A master of surprise attacks and stealthy kills.

name: Lamia
desc: A half-woman, half-snake.

name: Werecat
desc: Another victim of the infamous wereanimal curse.

name: Undead Werecat
desc: A victim of two curses at once.

name: Harpy
desc: Harpies are known for their love to seduce travelers in order to breed, and protected by the law in many countries unless they attack first.

name: Vixen
desc: Vixens kidnap men from villages and small towns in order to breed, and protected by the law in some countries where the presence of women in politics is low.

name: Hag
desc: Hags attack men in big cities and rape them on the spot in order to breed. In some cities they replace brothels and have to pay brothel taxes every year.

name: Goblin
desc: A small carnivore creature with razor sharp teeth.

name: Goblin Archer
desc: A small carnivore creature with a primitive bow.

name: Goblin Warrior
desc: A small carnivore creature with a primitive axe.

name: Goblin Shaman
desc: A small carnivore creature familiar with some basic magic.

name: Ogre
desc: A massive muscular creature. Its main diet are goblins, however his vision is too poor to distinguish them from humans.

name: Cyclop
desc: A massive muscular creature. They say his eye can shoot deadly laser beams, but there is no reliable evidence.

name: Undine
desc: A water based lifeform consisting entirely of females. Ponds with non-aggressive undines are equally popular among men and lesbians.

name: Dark Undine
desc: A predacious undine corrupted by water pollution.

name: Energized Undine
desc: A subspecies of undine with ability to accumulate electric charge thanks to its unusual chemical composition.

name: Frozen Undine
desc: After particularly cold winters some undines forever remain frozen.

name: Mud Elemental
desc: A moving pile of mud without any self-consciousness.

name: Earth Elemental
desc: A wild and dangerous incarnation of the earth element.

name: Lava Elemental
desc: A wild and dangerous incarnation of the earth and fire elements.

name: Spectre
desc: A ghost born from the soul of a dead paladin. Unlike normal ghosts, it uses light to harm its victims.

name: Stone Eater
desc: A rare stones eating creature with granitic skin and diamond teeth.

name: Angel
desc: A messenger of the heavens. They are usually peaceful, however they attack you if you violate one of the sacred rules known only to angels themselves.

name: Archangel
desc: A high-ranked messenger of the heavens. They coordinate the actions of angels and personally involved only in very important battles.

name: Heaven Guardian
desc: Guardians protect the heavens and their outposts. Usually from mortals, since demons prefer the hell anyway.

name: Gargoyle
desc: An ugly statue animated by ancient wild magic.

name: Garuda
desc: Legends of distant lands tell of ancient deities, large bird-like humanoid creatures related to the sun itself.

name: Gazer
desc: A widespread plant with small magic abilities. The eye is used for aiming spells.

name: Chimera
desc: A monstrous creature consisting of parts of multiple animals.

name: Bats
desc: A flock of rabid bats.

name: Vampire Bats
desc: A predatory flock of carnivorous bats.

name: Secateuris
desc: A hideous flesh-eating insect. Even seasoned warriors cannot look at it without flinching.

name: Giant Spider
desc: A giant poisonous spider. They say its poison can kill a small city.

name: Royal Mantis
desc: A giant ambush predator with huge scythe-like claws and excellent reflexes.

name: Cetus
desc: A carnivorous amphibian inhabiting non-navigable rivers.

name: Flaming Fox
desc: A legendary fiery beast from the Fire elemental dimension.

name: Crawler
desc: A subterranean predator. It prefers moles, but a small part of a human body is not a problem for his stomach too.

name: Succubus
desc: A lower demon of lust. Those who cannot defend themselves from her will be raped for days, regardless of gender and age.

name: Mare
desc: A demon of lust. They are actually reasonable enough to try and seduce victim for a start. But they still attack if rejected.

name: Lilith
desc: A high demon of lust. Smart, seductive and treacherous, they are rarely engage in combat.

name: Horny Succubus
desc: When a demon of lust is unable to satisfy herself for a long time, she dies. But before that she turns into a death machine, tearing to pieces and raping everything she sees.

name: Oni
desc: A weird creature from ancient legends of distant lands. They actually have not existed, but the potential of faith of many generations eventually gave them life.

name: Lesser Vampire
desc: An undead being who subsists by feeding on the life essence, generally in the form of blood, of living creatures.

name: Night Mare
desc: A demon of lust that can only feed on hardcore bdsm actions. Very powerful and very popular in certain circles.

name: Wolf
desc: Wolves might not have magic or special training, but they are predators and excellent instinctive hunters.

name: Black Wolf
desc: Black Wolves are bigger, angrier and stronger than usual ones.

name: Bear
desc: Bears are too big and bad-tempered to form big hunting packs. It won't help you though if you meet one of them in a bad mood.

name: Werewolf
desc: A typical cursed shapeshifter.

name: Feonix
desc: A subspecies of wolf with considerable magic powers.

name: Link Wolf
desc: A rare intelligent subspecies of wolf with basic healing abilities.

name: Wild Dryad
desc: Often confused with wild elves, dryads do not care about anything but the forest itself.

name: Druid
desc: A crazy old hermit. Noone can keep the sanity and healthy stomach eating only mushrooms and berries.

name: Shadowman
desc: He gave everything he had to the darkness. So now darkness is everything he has.

name: Skeleton
desc: A mindless, quite fragile pile of bones animated by dark magic.

name: Skeleton Warrior
desc: A dead warrior animated by dark magic. His bones still remember how to fight.

name: Phantasm
desc: Wandering without a purpose remnants of someone's soul.

name: Polar Bear
desc: Just like a normal bear, but bigger, whiter and angrier.

name: Tundra Wolf
desc: Life in tundra is harsh. Tundra wolves are smarter and bigger than forest ones.

name: Wikkawak
desc: A strange creature from an ancient primitive tribe with an unpronounceable name.

name: Yeti
desc: A goat-like massive herbivorous creature. It won't attack you in order to eat, but it has a territory to protect.

name: Frost Giant
desc: A huge ancient hermit. Giants have lost the ability to reproduce for an unknown reason many centuries ago.

name: Ice Maiden
desc: A mysterious female creature from the dimension of Ice. She may look hot, but her touch can freeze you on spot.

name: Winter Queen
desc: A high elemental of Ice, whose breath freezes the air around her.

name: Ice Golem
desc: Animated by magic humanoid mass of ice.

name: Frozen Heart
desc: A mage who came too close to the essence of the Ice in arcane studies.

name: Devil Rat
desc: As long as there is a food, rats can survive almost anywhere. Even in the Hell.

name: Weregirl
desc: An unusual, rare shapeshifter: a wild cat that transforms into a hot girl.

name: Horny Medusa
desc: Medusas often stay next to human settlements. Once a year, they looking for a new victim as a partner for mating, because even petrified partners are not eternal.

name: Minotauress
desc: A female Minotaur. Tall and muscular, yet sexy enough to find a partner for mating, often without the use of force.

name: Minotaur
desc: These tall and muscular bull-like creatures presumably were made by the Ancients to protect their cities from wild animals and monsters. They can still be encountered in sufficient quantities near ancient ruins.

name: Thunderous Cloud
desc: A hostile cloud of magical mist.

name: Steam Cloud
desc: A hostile cloud of magical mist.

name: Mimicess
desc: Mimics pretend to be a treasure chest in order to capture unwary travelers and drag them inside for mating.

name: Mimic
desc: Mimics pretend to be a treasure chest in order to capture unwary travelers and devour them.

name: Stoner
desc: A small and kinda cuit creature from the elemental dimension of Earth.

name: Will-o-wisp
desc: A fading remnant of someone's soul with basic magical abilities.

name: Wind Spirit
desc: A soul merged with infinite streams of air.

name: Water Spirit
desc: A soul caught in looped flows of water.

name: Fire Spirit
desc: A soul enveloped in never fading flames.

name: Ifrit
desc: A wicked and ruthless infernal jinn from the dimension of Fire.

name: Seeker
desc: Seekers spend their lives looking for rare items. They never steal or trade though, so usually people just ignore them.

name: Barbarian Maiden
desc: A wild nomad, hot and merciless.

name: Seraph
desc: A high-ranked archangel, a master of the Light magic and a seasoned warrior.

name: Malicious Stone
desc: It's just a stone. But for some reason you cannot move on until you break it into small pieces.

name: Ogress
desc: A massive muscular creature unfamiliar with the concept of bra.

name: Satyress
desc: A goat-like creature, frisky and playful. They often abuse alcohol and drugs, attacking people in a deranged state.

name: Chaos
desc: An embodiment of rage. It used to be an ordinary elemental from the dimension of Fire before connecting itself to the Darkness.

name: Boros
desc: A hulking, clumsy beast inhabiting warmer regions.

name: Flytrap
desc: A continuously growing carnivorous plant. Uncanny survivability allows it to instantly absorb many elements before they have a chance to damage it.

name: Griffin
desc: A flying predator feeding on cattle. Killed off by farmers, they've been driven to verge of extinction.

name: Royal Knight
desc: A proud member of the royal Guard.

name: Knightess
desc: Another younger daughter from a noble family.

name: Alarmer
desc: An ancient stand-alone security device.

name: Foggy Knight
desc: A set of heavy armour filled with milky fog, which quickly dispels after destruction of the armour.

name: Infantryman
desc: A soldier of the regular army.

name: Thug
desc: A violent criminal, robber and murderer.

name: Undead Cemetry
desc: Woven together remains of multiple once living beings.

name: Deathling
desc: An ex elemental of Darkness, now just a distorted, twisted reflection of the Grim Reaper.

name: Quick Silver
desc: A moving mixture of several elements, immune to almost any magic.

name: Woolman
desc: Woolmen are known for their ability to generate static electricity as a defense against predators.

name: Mercenary
desc: A professional soldier providing his services to anyone for a fee.

name: Vortex
desc: An aggressive clot of negative energy.

name: Fiery Shadow
desc: The shadow of a former magician who killed himself while using fire magic against someone. Be careful with your fireballs.

name: Thunderous Shadow
desc: The shadow of a former magician who killed himself while using electricity magic against someone. Be careful with your lighting.

name: Flame Spirit
desc: The living embodiment of the element of Fire.

name: Thunder Spirit
desc: The living embodiment of the element of Electricity.

name: Dark Spirit
desc: The living embodiment of the element of Darkness.

name: Aqueous Spirit
desc: The living embodiment of the element of Water.

name: Storm Spirit
desc: The living embodiment of the element of Air.

name: Naga Archer
desc: A half-snake, half-woman. Because of the unusual structure of the body they are experiencing certain difficulties during mating.

name: Giant Scorpion
desc: A predatory arachnid armed with claws and a venomous stinger.

name: Black Butterfly
desc: A widespread scavenger. Silent, fast and voracious, they almost completely replaced crows in most areas.

name: Gluttony
desc: An artificially created omnivore. It can eat and digest absolutely anything.

name: Sahagin
desc: A humanoid reptile from a primitive tribe inhabiting along the banks of rivers and lakes.

name: Lust
desc: An artificially created succubus. She doesn't need to eat and breath, but sex is mandatory for her survival.

name: Horny Mummy
desc: The ancients knew how to protect the body from decay. Over time, the process only intensified, and eventually brought them back to life.

name: Blast Beetle
desc: A fire-spitting insect. Its unusual abilities help it to survive even in coldest areas.

name: Titan
desc: They say some Ancients turned themselves into these creatures in order to survive upcoming climate change.

name: Wadding
desc: A cute and fluffy small animal. There have been numerous attempts to tame them, but they all failed.

name: Shy Rabber
desc: Anything that once lived and died can be raised as undead. Uncontrolled growth of the population of these creatures led to a ban on condoms.

name: Angry Rabber
desc: Anything that once lived and died can be raised as undead. This specific creature is the result of rape.

name: Dark Elf Archer
desc: A scout from the Underground Empire of Dark Elves.

name: Harpy Queen
desc: The most powerful and sexy harpy becomes the queen of a flock.

name: Beargirl
desc: Most beargirls do not realize that they are not average bears, and behave accordingly.

name: Skyfish
desc: Flying predators whose bodies are lighter than air due to hydrogen bubbles inside.

name: Sky Jellyfish
desc: A flying creature with multiple inseminating tentacles, capable to generate electricity to paralyse its victims before raping them.

name: Cannon Turtle
desc: This creature able to shoot large stones from a cavity in its shell.

name: Bemoth
desc: A massive herbivorous with sturdy exoskeleton, designed by evolution to defend the creature from farmers while it devours their crops.

name: Cockatrice
desc: According to folk legends, a product of a homosexual relationship between two roosters. Sounds unlikely, but you never know.

name: Electrificator
desc: An ancient defensive mechanism.

name: Naiad
desc: Naiads tend to settle on the ocean floor, surfacing every few years only for mating.

name: Technomancer
desc: Those who study and use in battle ancient devices left by long-vanished empires are called technomancers.

name: Headhunter
desc: Headhunters are legitimate assassins who work for the government.

name: Syringer
desc: Syringers work for the government, specializing in kidnapping.

name: Duelist
desc: An elite swordsman working for the government.

name: Fencer
desc: An elite swordswoman working for the government.
